com.tyrlib2.graphics.materials

Class TerrainMaterial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.graphics.renderer.Material
      • com.tyrlib2.graphics.materials.LightedMaterial
        • com.tyrlib2.graphics.materials.TerrainMaterial

  • public class TerrainMaterial
extends LightedMaterial
    Default material for rendering 3D objects especially entities. Supports: - Lighting - Per vertex coloring - Skinning/skeletal animation - Texturing
    Author:
    Sascha
